name: Dark Defenders
description:
Dark Defenders is a single player mobile gaming app developed by Oluwasegun Adekola. The aim of the game is to help the defenders escape the toughest escape room in the world. It requires fast thinking and quick decision making. Collecting coins enables you get better defenders.

• Traps
• Escape from danger
• Quick thinking
• Canon balls
• Underground Spikes
• Coins
